name: One Piece
description: The series focuses on Monkey D. Luffy - a young man made of rubber whom inspired by his childhood idol (the powerful pirate Shanks) sets off on a journey from the East Blue Sea to find the mythical treasure known as the One Piece. His goal is to one day proclaim himself the King of the Pirates.
analysis: You are someone who craves adventure and appreciates the value of serendipity. You enjoy taking risks and testing your luck.

name: Naruto
description: A powerful fox known as the Nine-Tails attacks Konoha - the hidden leaf village in the Land of Fire. The series tells the story of Naruto Uzumaki: a young ninja within whom the nine-tails is sealed. This story is highly acclaimed for its action and strong references to Japanese mythology.
analysis: Your favorite part of any show is the ACTION. You gravitate towards idealism and see the best and the worst in everyone you meet. History intrigues you and you have feel a strong pull towards leadership.

name: Hunter x Hunter
description: The protagonist is young Gon who departs on a journey to become a Hunter (a licensed professional who specializes in fantastical pursuits) and eventually find his father. Along the way Gon meets various other Hunters and encounters the paranormal.
analysis: You are someone who values friendship over all other things. You are not quick to anger except when your friends are attacked. You will go to the ends of the earth to show you care.

name: One Punch
description: This series tells the story of Saitama - a superhero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch but seeks to find a worthy opponent after growing bored by a lack of challenge due to his overwhelming strength.
analysis: You are someone who values drama and comedy in your life. You can also appreciate the value in approaching challenges with a positive mindset as well as questioning the reasoning behind tradition.

name: Your Lie in April
description: This series follows a piano prodigy who lost his ability to play after suffering a traumatic event in his childhood and is forced back into the spotlight by an eccentric girl with a secret of her own.
analysis: You are a romantic through and through. You enjoy a good love story and can appreciate the more delicate matters in life. Although you may show others a tough exterior your barriers can be broken down by the right person.
